price: 9. Dirabbosseh nabiyow ku meelak naharat Nabii Nuuc meela, usun dirabboyseenim ni naqsu Nuucu kaadu cabuli kaak iyyeeniih kaa sahteeniih kaa xiiriyeenih.
arabic: ۞ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ فَكَذَّبُواْ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُواْ مَجۡنُونٞ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin fakadhabū ʿabdanā waqālū majnūnun wa-uz'dujira
